tool.name: ScriptManager: Sort GFF by CDT
tool.description: Sort GFF file by CDT file statistics.
tool.command:
ln -s '$input1' file.gff && ln -s '$input2' file.cdt && ln -s '$output1' output.gff && ln -s '$output2' output.cdt && java -jar $__tool_directory__/ScriptManager-v0.14-dev.jar coordinate-manipulation sort-gff
#if str($sort_options.sort) == "center" : -c "$sort_options.size_expansion" #else if str($sort_options.sort) == "index" : -x "$sort_options.index_start" "$sort_options.index_stop" #end if
-o output
file.gff file.cdt
tool.help: **What it does** Sort a CDT file and its corresponding GFF file by the total score in the CDT file across the specified interval.
